attacks.name: Algorithm GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 5 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Magical Ribbon
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Plea GX
attacks.effect: Put 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to them into your opponent’s hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Adamantine Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ultra Uppercut GX
attacks.effect: (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Righteous Edge
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Berserk
attacks.effect: If your Benched Pokémon have any damage counters on them, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Big Wheel GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 10 cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Hala
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. If you have used your GX attack, draw 7 cards. If not, draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Hau
cards.effect: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Mallow
cards.effect: Search your deck for 2 cards, shuffle your deck, then put those cards on top of it in any order.

abilities.name: Feather Arrow
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hollow Hunt GX
attacks.effect: Put 3 cards from your discard pile into your hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Hustling Strike
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Fire Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tiger Swing
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Burning Slam GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Shell Trap
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nitro Tank GX
attacks.effect: Attach 5 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Bubble Beat
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roaring Seas
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grand Echo GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Ice Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Blizzard Edge
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ice Path GX
attacks.effect: Move all damage counters from this Pokémon to your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Torrential Vortex
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blue Surge GX
attacks.effect: Move all Energy from this Pokémon to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Charge Beam
attacks.effect: Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Zap Cannon
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gigatron GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Aero Trail
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may move any number of Lightning Energy from your other Pokémon to this Pokémon. If you do, switch this Pokémon with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tapu Thunder GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your opponent’s Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Super Intense Poison
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 10 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Total Shelter GX
attacks.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Wonder Tag
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Energy Drive
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon. This damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Tapu Cure GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from 2 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Eyes
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dangerous Rogue GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Geotech System
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic or Metal Energy card from your discard pile to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Hammer
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Giga Hammer during your next turn.

attacks.name: Algorithm GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 5 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Magical Ribbon
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Plea GX
attacks.effect: Put 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to them into your opponent’s hand. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Adamantine Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ultra Uppercut GX
attacks.effect: (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Righteous Edge
attacks.effect: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Berserk
attacks.effect: If your Benched Pokémon have any damage counters on them, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Big Wheel GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 10 cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Aqua Patch
cards.effect: Attach a Water Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Water Pokémon.

cards.name: Enhanced Hammer
cards.effect: Discard a Special Energy from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

cards.name: Field Blower
cards.effect: Choose up to 2 in any combination of Pokémon Tool cards and Stadium cards in play (yours or your opponent’s) and discard them.

cards.name: Max Potion
cards.effect: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, discard all Energy from that Pokémon.

cards.name: Rare Candy
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it. You can’t use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
